page.title: 14SPONSORED WALK IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: The children of Grove Road School decided to have a sponsored walk to raise{money}for a{new computer.}We needed{Â£900}for a BBC"B", monitor, stand, printer and Edword. All the children got as many sponsors as possible, and on{7th May 1985}we all walked around Orchard field. The {infants}had to do{10 laps,}and the {juniors}did{20.}The teachers just sat around the field in chairs and ticked our cards, and Mrs Broadley served refreshments, as it was a very hot day. We raised just over{Â£1,100}in the end, and we have ordered the new equipment. When it is delivered we are going to invite the local press, and they are all going to write a report about our computer.This event was also reported in the{Grove Road Gazette, edited by some of our fourth years.
